p: The study was designed as multicenter nationwide cohort analysis performed on behalf of the Polish Society of Pediatric Oncology and Hematology. Viral infections diagnosed during a six-year period (between January 1, 2012 and December 31, 2017), were reported by all Polish pediatric HCT centers (Bydgoszcz, Krakow, Lublin, Poznan, Wroclaw) and data were analyzed centrally by two independent researchers. Data from the first 2-year period were collected retrospectively, then prospectively afterwards.
